text: Pallodes is a genus of sap-feeding beetles in the family Nitidulidae. There are at least three described species in Pallodes. ==Species== These three species belong to the genus Pallodes. * Pallodes austrinus Leschen, 1988 * Pallodes pallidus (Beauvois, 1805) * Pallodes plateosus Schaeffer, 1931 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * * Category:Nitidulidae
title: Pallodes
